attributes.title: ✨🧚🏽disgusting ✨🧚🏽
attributes.review: i downloaded this app to see how horrible and disgusting it is. all of these reviews that are saying that this app is the WORST app possible to have is TRUE. i truly regret downloading this app , please don’t make the same MISTAKE as i did. i’m just here to clear things out.                              ...............             -xoxo Gossip GIRL

attributes.title: TERRIBLE
attributes.review: As soon as I opened the app my phone froze terribly !! I had to go to the Apple store and even THEY couldn’t fix it. I had to buy a completely new phone. Whatever u do DONT get this app it’ll ruin ur phone. I’m disappointed the president I look up to and love would create such a terrible app!!

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: This app is just horrible and sends fake news all I have to say in this is that trump 2020💫🧚🏼on a tombstone 🧚🏻‍♀️🌸 he should not allowe this it’s honestly horrible and also they thought gen z was not powerful but we are hope u don’t make a mistake by missing with us again

attributes.title: ✨🧚‍♀️😗you did something🧚‍♀️✨😳don’t do it again☺️🧚‍♀️✨
attributes.review: Absolute garbage the only reason why I got the app was to write a report on how disgusting this app is, and I also downloaded this app just to rate a one star because I know that if this app get below a one star it will get it off the App Store 💫 ✨🍒

attributes.title: Horrible app spam messaging
attributes.review: I was spammed with messages....If by any chance you gave your number in the beginning and your getting spammed w/ messages you can just text “stop” they are obligated to stop sending you messages. From your friendly neighborhood gen-z ☺️

attributes.title: melania😜
attributes.review: I got the app, and to my surprise once I opened it I received a notification from the app claiming I would get a virus on my phone named “trump does foreigner challenge”😰 I was so scared and immediately had to delete the app do not recommend💔 also rip trump you were a great president while you lasted😜💖👍🙈

attributes.title: HORRIBLE
attributes.review:
To start off with this app I opened it and my phone started dispensing fumes it smelt HORRIBLE!! LIKE ACTUAL FECES!! then a ROACH crawled on my screen (I found out it was fake)!!
Like what the heck?????

I was willing to brush this all off and just restart the app this time, nothing happened but all I saw was fox news a biased news source!!! Then I got showed petitions!!

I was willing to give it another chance so I restarted the app and it took me so long to re-log in that I missed my WABLM meeting!! (whites against blm)!!

This is truly the WORST app and is a mocking to trump supporters!!!

attributes.title: Really Donny?
attributes.review: I hardly ever download apps. All I wanted was to feel connected to the one and only Donny. I had such hopes this app was going to be great, never done before. What do I find when I download it? FAKE. So many intrusions if privacy come along with the app, I felt like I was in China. All I have to say is... really Donny?

attributes.title: I don’t recommend
attributes.review: Whenever I open this app, all I see is an orange man with dementia and a combover taking over the screen. I thought that this app was supposed to “keep america great” but all it does is highlight our absolutely amazing president Trump’s racist, sexist, homophobic, and fascist tendencies. anyways... happy early birthday Obama!

attributes.title: Honestly Horrible
attributes.review: I can’t say I was expecting much from this app but it still someone was worse than my expectations. Not surprised however because bunker boy cannot even run a country, why should I expect him to be able to create a decent app. :(
